structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: Monitoring of establishment of nursing home beds -- Collection of data -- Secretary's report to General Assembly.

text.section: Prior to the beginning of the 2004 Regular Session of the General Assembly, the secretary shall issue a report to the President of the Senate and the Speaker of the House of Representatives, the chair of the Senate Standing Committee on Health and Welfare, and the chair of the House Standing Committee on Health and Welfare addressing the impact of KRS 216B.015, 216B.020, 216B.330, and 216B.332 upon the state's Medicaid budget, consumer access issues, and providers of long-term care.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 2, effective March 28, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000.
